GSD.description:
drivers: staging: rtl8192u: Fix deadlock in ieee80211_beacons_stop()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit b34cb54923a6e5ddefbaf358c85c922c6ab456e2. For more details please see the references link.
